verbs.description: [ARG0: t - mobile] to [V: buy] [ARG1: sprint] [ARG3: for 26 5 billion] [ARGM-MNR: in bet on networks t - mobile us] inc agreed to acquire sprint corp for 26 5 billion in stock a wager that the carriers can team up to build a next - generation wireless network and get a jump on industry leaders verizon communications inc and at&t inc att softbank deutsche telekom sprint t mobile usa
